scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition, 1921-1931, to the Charles Fort Collection contains 6 items. Included are a typescript of page 176 from Fort's manuscript Lo!, correspondence concerning the manuscripts, and books of the Fortean Society.
Page 176 is missing from TMs of Lo! in 7657-a.

did.unittitle: Tiffany Thayer to Nathan Wallack [1931 Nov 14]

scopecontent.p: Sends a page, probably from Fort's Lo!. Refers to Fort letters and notes which he cannot send to N. W.

did.unittitle: T. T. to Nelson Bond 1921 Apr 28 [1951 Apr 28]["1921" refers to 21st year of Fort- an Society]

scopecontent.p: Mentions DOUBT #4. Asks about Nathan Wallack. Mentions the Lobblies, Dianetics; comments on Hubbard's prose. 1 p.
